caption:
Meet the Regen Brands Coalition - a group of more than 30 mission-driven brands using regenerative agriculture to fix what’s broken in our food system.

Regenerative agriculture isn’t just a buzzword. It’s how we heal the land, nourish people, and fight climate change—all through the food we grow and eat. Every brand in this coalition has earned its place—through verified sourcing, regenerative practices, and partnerships with farmers that prioritize soil health, biodiversity, and long-term resilience.

When you support regenerative brands, you’re investing in a food system that gives back more than it takes.

We’re proud to be part of this movement—and to work alongside other brand leaders from diverse paths doing the hard work to restore ecosystems, support farmers, and produce nutritious food.
 #IHeartRegen #RegenBrandsCoalition #RegenerativeAgriculture #SoilHealth #EatForChange
